data.text:
ABC NO RIO

156 Rivington St. (betw. Suffolk & Clinton Sts.), 212-254-3697, www.abcnorio.org FRI: "The Talking Stick/Lovesphere Jam," 8, $5. SAT: Yaphet Kotto, Volume Eleven (feat. members of Los Cincos), Panthers (members of Red Scare, Turing Machine & Orchid), Murdock, 3, $5.

ACME UNDERGROUND

9 Great Jones St. (betw. B'way & Lafayette St.), 212-420-1934. See also "Clubs & Lounges." WEDS: Space Station Intigration, Chris Sheppard, Shaking Tree, Mosiac Dust, Mike Brown Project. THURS: Generica, Sunbather, John Taglier, Roman Navarro, Maquimono. FRI: The Peasants, Pop Mafia, Early Edison, Halfmanwonder, The Divers, Jenny Arneau. SAT: She-Rock-O-Rama benefit for Safe Horizon, feat. Sympathetic Magic, The Catholic Girls, Dirty Mary, Bitchcat, Battershell, Galvanized, 8, $10. MON: Split Fifty, Sultmon, Endgames, Vais. TUES: Quest for Nine, Fuzzy Daupner, Sherman, Seeds.

ARLENE GROCERY

95 Stanton St. (betw. Ludlow & Orchard Sts.), 212-358-1633, www.arlene-grocery.com No cover on Mon., rest of the week $20 for "Closing Time" w/Irish Pub Theater. WEDS: Fools By April, Bullet, The Booty Olympics, 9. THURS: David Dragov, Tryst, Lourds, L.P., 9. FRI: Lotus 33, Episonic, Double Wide, Kaz Silver, 9. SAT: Jane Jensen & Dolls, The Everyothers, Nitromusk, Mirror People, 9. SUN: Tommy Peoples, Sean Tyrell, 9. MON: Punk/metal karaoke, 10; Sound of Monday, The Drakes, 8. TUES: D.G.Q., Swati, Cornbread Mafia, 9.

B-3

33 Ave. B (3rd St.), 212-614-9755. THURS: B-3 Band, 7:30. FRI: DJ Allesseo's "Affair Party," 9. SAT: Rick Johnson & open mic, 6.

BABY JUPITER

170 Orchard St. (Stanton St.), 212-982-BABY. MON: Silleth Fair feat. Emmy Gay, Shecky Beagleman, Penny Arcade & weekly guests, 8, $1. TUES: Peter Dizozza & Tony Hightower, 8, $7.

BITTER END

147 Bleecker St. (Thompson St.), 212-673-7030. All shows at 8 & are $5 unless specified. WEDS: Moshav Band, $10; Paul Brill, Karen Lloyd, Adrienne, Kim's Fable, 7:30. THURS: Say Zuzu, Dayna Blitz, Four Wilson Drive, Clementine, $7; Bearden Coleman, $7; Dave's True Story, 7. FRI: Mann Made Band, The Studio Pres., 7, $7. SAT: Days of Wild, Corky Freak, Cutter Jones, Moe Loughran, Billy Patterson. SUN: Mann Made Jam, Marissa Marchant. MON: Days of Wild, Soul Alone, Joe Brack, Edie Carey, Marie Maziotti. TUES: Stop Irrational Logic, Sara Wheeler, Rose Coppola, Jenny Bruce, Karen Jacobson.

BOWERY BALLROOM

6 Delancey St. (Bowery), 212-533-2111. Weds. & Thurs. is 21 & over, Fri. 18 & over & Sat. 16 & over. WEDS: Blue Rodeo, John Wesley Harding, Honeydogs, 8:30, $16. THURS: Tahiti 80, Metric, The Sharp Things, 8:30, $12. FRI: The Strokes, 10, $10. SAT: Idlewild, Brassy, Lo-Hi, 8:30, $12.

THURS: The Letter E, Chris Brokaw & Thalia Zedek (Come), Fly Pan Am, 8:30, $10. FRI: Peter Salett, Champale, Ben Kweller, 9:30, $8. SAT: Double Dong (CD release), Creme Blush, Pearly Sweets & the Platonics, Split Me Wide Open, 9, $8. SUN: Rye Coalition, Dead Meadow, Ex Models, Dateline Diamonds, 8, $8. MON: I Am Spoonbender, Slaves, Radio 4, The Seconds, 8, $8. TUES: Florence Dore, Nefertiti Jones, Honey Dogs, Methusulah Jones, 8, $7.

THURS: Bree Sharp, Jeremy Eade, Goat, 8:30, free. FRI: DJ Steve Mach, Vulgaras, Buzzer, Jana Peri, 11, $5. SAT: Memorial for Patrick Blank, 2-5, free. MON: Pisk*A Slam feat. Hal Sirowietz, 8.
